pages.text: $(item)Energized Gunpowder$() is a weaponized $(marked)Rite Material$() of both Fire and Electricity.$(br)It can be used to unleash a projectile of high power, causing high explosion damage on impact. This explosion won't destroy any blocks.
Energized Gunpowder is created by putting $(item)Gunpowder$() in a $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Basin$() with $(item)Essence of Electricity$().
